content:
Defense forces continue to inflict on the enemy losses in living power and equipment in the eastern direction.

This is stated in the message inTelegramsKhortytsia dawn.

During the last day, the Russian army lost 636 servicemen, two ammunition warehouses and PMM.

In addition, our defenders destroyed 10 tanks, 27 combat armored vehicles, 7 guns and mortars and 10 units of car equipment.

It also managed to impress 5 remedies, 527 UAVs of various types and 23 enemy shelters.

As reported by the Armyinform, in the last days of March in Donetsk Russiansuffered an epic defeat,Trying to attack the position of defense forces, -destructionThe large column of hostile equipment is confirmed by the 25 separate airborne Sicheslav Brigade.
title: In the east, the occupiers lost 10 tanks per day, 5 remedies and warehouses with ammunition
description: This is stated in a message in the telegram-channel "Khortytsia". During the past day ...
author: Army Inform
